issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
TestPartitionNameWhitelistValidation uses remote metastore. However, there can be multiple issues around startup of remote metastore, including race conditions in finding available port. In addition, all the initialization done at startup of remote metastore is likely to make the test case take more time.
This test case doesn't need remote metastore, so it should be moved to using embedded metastore.

comments.body: 2.patch - Moving the setup to a one time setup saves at least another second .

Overall around 5 seconds saved -
cc [~sseth]

Before -

[~thejas] - you may want to look at mvn test output, rather than the junit result file. The junit result file does not include the setup time. My guess is the metastore is started during initialization? It may be more than 5 seconds saved overall.

[~sseth]

Looking at mvn outputs, yes, the difference looks larger -

Before -
Hive Integration - Unit Tests ...................... SUCCESS [ 35.974 s]
Total time: 01:28 min

After -
Hive Integration - Unit Tests ...................... SUCCESS [ 26.785 s]
Total time: 01:09 min

Though there seems to be more noise when total time is considered .
